member.name: AudioSessionState
member.summary: The AudioSessionState enumeration defines constants that indicate the current state of an audio session.

member.name: AudioSessionState.AudioSessionStateInactive
member.summary: The audio session is inactive. (It contains at least one stream, but none of the streams in the session is currently running.)

member.name: AudioSessionState.AudioSessionStateActive
member.summary: The audio session is active. (At least one of the streams in the session is running.)

member.name: AudioSessionState.AudioSessionStateExpired
member.summary: The audio session has expired. (It contains no streams.)
